statements: UPDATE space_inventory SET quantity = 10 WHERE equipment_name = 'laptop';

UPDATE space_inventory SET quantity = 10, location = 'Warehouse A' WHERE equipment_id = 1;
UPDATE space_inventory SET location = 'Storage Room B', quantity = quantity + 5 WHERE equipment_name = 'Forklift';
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = quantity + 5, location = 'Warehouse B' WHERE item_id = 1;
UPDATE supplies SET supplier = 'New Supplier Inc.', quantity = quantity - 3 WHERE supply_id = 3;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = quantity - 10 WHERE item_name = 'Apples';
UPDATE supplies SET quantity = quantity + 20, supplier = 'New Supplier' WHERE supply_name = 'Pencils';
UPDATE equipment SET price = 25.99, quantity = 10 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE supplies SET quantity = 100, supplier = 'ABC Suppliers' WHERE supply_name = 'Pencils';
UPDATE equipment SET quantity = quantity + 5, price = price * 1.1 WHERE id = 12345;
UPDATE supplies SET supplier = 'New Supplier', expiration_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE supply_name = 'Widgets';
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = quantity + 5 WHERE item_id = 101;
UPDATE employees SET department = 'Sales' WHERE employee_id = 201;
UPDATE inventory SET quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE item_id = 1001;
UPDATE purchases SET purchase_date = '2022-05-15', quantity_purchased = 50 WHERE purchase_id = 2001;
